oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Installation of the Italian Fountain
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Festivals; Quadrangles (Courtyards)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: As part of Memphis in May's tribute to Italy, Christian Brothers University erected a replica of an Italian fountain in the middle of Buckman Quad.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law.
